description:
Owner of the Chinese restaurant named Tetsujin-ya (鉄人屋, Strong Men House).
He offers his customers to eat his "Strong Men Set Meal" free of charge if they manage to eat it within 60 minutes (which http://anidb.net/ch6963 [Akiho] challenges http://anidb.net/ch6961 [Kana] for in episode 4).
name: Kisaragi Juurou
